item.description:
I pushed the time back a little as it is a Sunday afterall...

Lets meet outside the Barking Crab and 11am. The nearest T is South Station, call me if you have trouble finding it. If your running late let me know so I know to wait.

The plan is to ride along the bike path next to the water down to U Mass/ JFK library and back. There is a small part where we need to ride on the road but most of the ride will be along the path.

We will finish up at the Barking Crab and reward ourselves with some nice cold beer. If anyone just wants to join for the drinks I would say we would get there around 3 but you can call me in the afternoon for a better estimate if you like.

Has anyone got a frisbee they could bring on the ride?

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Bike ride - South Shore / Afternoon drinks at the Barking Crab
